{{cpp/ranges/drop_while_view/title|drop_while_view}}
{{cpp/ranges/drop_while_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
drop_while_view() requires std::default_initializable&lt;V&gt; &amp;&amp;
                           std::default_initializable&lt;Pred&gt; = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1=
constexpr explicit drop_while_view( V base, Pred pred );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs a {{tt|drop_while_view}}.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying view {{rlpi|/#Data members|base_}} and the predicate {{rlpi|/#Data members|pred_}}.

@2@ Move constructs the underlying view {{tti|base_}} from {{c|base}} and the predicate {{tti|pred_}} from {{c|pred}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|base|underlying view}}
{{par|pred|predicate}}
{{par end}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;functional&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    static constexpr auto a = {-2, -7, -1, -8, -2, +-+8, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5};
    auto positive = [](int x) { return 0 &lt; x; };
    for (auto v = std::ranges::drop_while_view{a, std::not_fn(positive)}; int x : v)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; x &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
3 1 4 1 5 
}}
